          <title>
            <string language="fr">Planètes tournant autour du soleil</string>
            <string language="en">Planets revolving around the Sun</string>

Sonne entlang ihren Bahnen rotieren.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os planetas que revolvem
